issue.title: [Java] [JDBC] BinaryConsumer cannot reallocate memory correctly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12012](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12012). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The data buffer reallocation logic of BinaryConsumer is wrong, and it doesn’t handle the case where offset buffer is exceeded.
